title: spacy-wordnet
description: `spacy-wordnet` creates annotations that easily allow the use of WordNet and [WordNet Domains](http://wndomains.fbk.eu/) by using the [NLTK WordNet interface](http://www.nltk.org/howto/wordnet.html)
